module.name: oav
module.summary: Open AntiVirus scannerdaemon and signature update

interface.name: oav_domtrans_update
interface.summary: Execute oav_update in the oav_update domain.

interface.name: oav_run_update
interface.summary: Execute oav_update in the oav_update domain, and allow the specified role the oav_update domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the oav_update domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the oav_update domain to use.
